patthana18.21:4.1: Saññojanaṃ hetuṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nosaññojano nahetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana18.21:4.3: Hetuyā cattāri … pe … vipāke ekaṃ … pe … avigate cattāri.
patthana18.21:5.1: Ganthaṃ hetuṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nogantho nahetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana18.21:5.3: Hetuyā nava … pe … vipāke ekaṃ … pe … avigate nava.
patthana18.21:6.1: Oghaṃ hetuṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca noogho nahetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana18.21:7.1: Yogaṃ hetuṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca noyogo nahetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana18.21:7.3: Hetuyā pañca … pe … vipāke ekaṃ … pe … avigate pañca.
patthana18.21:8.1: Nīvaraṇaṃ hetuṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nonīvaraṇo nahetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana18.21:8.3: Hetuyā cattāri … vipāke ekaṃ … pe … avigate cattāri.
patthana18.21:9.1: Noparāmāsaṃ hetuṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nanoparāmāso nahetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana18.21:9.3: Hetuyā tīṇi … vipāke ekaṃ … pe … avigate tīṇi.
